it seems to me that you need help in using me.
First let me introduce myself. I'm Afttha which is short for Automatic Fallout 3 (Three) terminal hacking application. My purpose is to help you hack terminals in the video game Fallout 3.

 For this you only need to provide me with the words given to you from the hacking mini game and then press the start button. From there on I will give to you the word you choose in the game and only expect you to give me the number of correct characters.
 If everything goes it normal way I will provide you with the correct solution normally on the third or fourth try.

 If you make an error while inputing a word and see it after you pressed the button to add the word, fear not, because all the words in the displayed list are intelligent, if you tap one of it, it will disappear and it will look like it never was there at all.

 If you have questions or problems you can send a mail to my developer Dennis Hillmann.
 I wish you in his and my name fun with this little app.
